meanings.definition: The act of arranging items in a particular order or sequence.
meanings.sent1: I did the sorting of my toys by color.
meanings.sent2: The sorting of books on the shelf made it easier to find what I needed.
meanings.sent3: The sorting of socks turned into a game of matching pairs.
meanings.sent4: Her sorting of thoughts helped her make sense of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The meticulous sorting of buttons by size and color was a calming activity.

meanings.definition: The process of categorizing or organizing items based on specific criteria.
meanings.sent1: The sorting of documents into folders was time-consuming.
meanings.sent2: Effective sorting of emails can improve productivity.
meanings.sent3: The sorting of vegetables into groups by color was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: His sorting of priorities helped him focus on what truly mattered.
meanings.sent5: The systematic sorting of cards into different decks was essential for the card game.
